name: NecroCore
description:
NecroCore is a First person rogue-like shooter that is currently early in development. 

The game is designed to be a fast paced shooter that brings together elements from old school shooters and modern shooters and combine with a unique art style.

CONTROLS

wasd - Move

spacebar - jump

left mouse - shoot

mouse wheel - switch guns

Left Shift - dash

E - Pick Up Weapon

Q - Cast ability

Tab - View Equipment

P- pause game

MOVEMENT:

Player moves with WASD and is able to perform a double jump. as well as a short range dash. ("Hoping to include vaulting pretty soon)

ABILITIES:

In the game the player is able to pick up new weapons, each weapon also has it's special ability that's tied to it. These abilities range from being simple projectiles to more utility based skills like slowing down time, or projecting a shield. 

THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS

Currently the game is a work in progress. What's in the build right now is just a tutorial level of the sorts. Procedural level generation, better animations, and optimization are on the way!
